promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a gigantic epic serpent grass-type pokemon wearing regal bracers. It can be found in woods-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, grass or serpent. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Bracerython, a a gigantic epic serpent grass-type pokemon. It can be found in woods-like environments It has the following abilities: Adamantine Press. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "serpent", "grass" or "Bracerython". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of grass-type pokemon, serpent-like, epic, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, emerald galaxy background
generatedDescription: This colossal verdant leviathan, known as Bracerython, dwells in the forest depth. With Adamantine Press, it shapes its domain unfettered.
